name: Crazy Tank
description:
《Crazy Tank》 is a third-person controlled Tank shooting game, the game screen is exquisite, process stimulation. After the game starts, your enemy headquarters will be opposite, you must destroy the enemy's tanks completely within the shortest time. If you do not destroy the enemy tanks within the specified time, the enemy will have more and more powerful tanks, the difficulty will be increased. Take control of your tank, which has two weapons, bombs and machine guns, and choose the right weapons to destroy your local tank units, while trying not to get hit by local weapons.
W: upward movement
S: move down
A: move to the left
D: move to the right
Q: switch weapons
